fact-4.value: Adevinta is the world’s largest online classifieds company (excluding China) based on revenues generated from online classifieds listings and advertisements, active in many countries around the world.

fact-5.value: Key markets include France, Spain and Germany. In addition, business was carried out in 2021 in Brazil, Italy, Austria, Ireland, Hungary, Mexico, Chile, Belarus, Morocco, UK, Australia, Belgium, Canada, China, Netherlands, South Africa and USA.
